des: "This can be kept in the refrigerator for at least a week. You can also omit the mayonnaise from the recipe if you need to. Tastes great on fish tacos or burgers!"
ins: Combine paleo mayonnaise, chipotle peppers, fresh cilantro, olive oil, lime juice, and garlic in a food processor or blender. Pulse or blend mixture until smooth and well combined, about 1 minute.
